w: She once was full of justice
so that we may know it
is like that of a lion
and the train of His robe
will be a stump [in the land]
It would be like a rod
as a sickness consumes a man
your neck will be too large
will become an object of contempt
will feed on them in summer
and He will hear their prayers
in the walls of the City
is about to shake you violently
will go to those who live
You have gained glory for Yourself
You have turned things upside down
to the music of a flute
against whom you have so blatantly
at [the sight of] the battle standard
He will devote them to destruction
I will cause him to fall
the king of Assyria had left
He will not come before it
You make an end of me
You make an end of me
You have restored me to health
in the hollow of his hand
with the span of his hand?
so that we may reflect on
that we may look on together in dismay
I was the first to tell
and all that is in it
and all who dwell in them
and [when you go through] the rivers
this thing in my right hand
to the depths of the sea
I have given you a title of honor
I will equip you for battle
To whom will you compare Me
I will bring it to pass
you laid a most heavy yoke
for the sake of My praise
can I let Myself be defamed
He who has compassion on them
to those who tore out My beard
I will bring it about quickly
so we can walk over you
of those who bring good news
Like one from whom men hide
and to cause Him to suffer
He will see [the light of life]
I will allot Him a portion
of her who has a husband
and drive your stakes in deep
I will have compassion on you
that I will not be angry
And you have made a pact
from your own flesh and blood
and I will make you ride
so that He does not hear
so that I may be glorified
[My people will have a] double portion
[to lead them] by the right hand
on behalf of those who wait
if we remain in our sins
[is like] one who breaks a dog’s
bring a baby to the point of birth
but His wrath will be shown
